items.sentence: You know what Tom said about Mary, don\'t you?
Tom wasn\'t exactly happy about what happened.
Tom told me that he wanted to change his name.
These artists are going to be famous some day.
These clothes are dirty and need to be washed.
These gloves should keep my hands warm enough.
What if someone killed Tom? What would you do?
Tom told me why he\'d decided to study French.
I\'ve never been to a French-speaking country.
The rumor is that they\'re going to Australia.
